member.name: T:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract
member.summary: The tesseract OCR engine

member.name: M:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.#ctor
member.summary: Create a default tesseract engine. Needed to Call Init function to load language files in a later stage.

member.name: M:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.#ctor(System.String,System.String,Emgu.CV.OCR.OcrEngineMode)
member.summary: Create an tesseract OCR engine.
member.param: The datapath must be the name of the parent directory of tessdata and must end in / . Any name after the last / will be stripped.

The language is (usually) an ISO 639-3 string or NULL will default to eng. It is entirely safe (and eventually will be efficient too) to call Init multiple times on the same instance to change language, or just to reset the classifier. The language may be a string of the form [~]%lt;lang>[+[~]<lang>]* indicating that multiple languages are to be loaded. Eg hin+eng will load Hindi and English. Languages may specify internally that they want to be loaded with one or more other languages, so the ~ sign is available to override that. Eg if hin were set to load eng by default, then hin+~eng would force loading only hin. The number of loaded languages is limited only by memory, with the caveat that loading additional languages will impact both speed and accuracy, as there is more work to do to decide on the applicable language, and there is more chance of hallucinating incorrect words.

member.name: M:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.#ctor(System.String,System.String,Emgu.CV.OCR.OcrEngineMode,System.String)
member.summary: Create an tesseract OCR engine.
member.param: The datapath must be the name of the parent directory of tessdata and must end in / . Any name after the last / will be stripped.

The language is (usually) an ISO 639-3 string or NULL will default to eng. It is entirely safe (and eventually will be efficient too) to call Init multiple times on the same instance to change language, or just to reset the classifier. The language may be a string of the form [~]%lt;lang>[+[~]<lang>]* indicating that multiple languages are to be loaded. Eg hin+eng will load Hindi and English. Languages may specify internally that they want to be loaded with one or more other languages, so the ~ sign is available to override that. Eg if hin were set to load eng by default, then hin+~eng would force loading only hin. The number of loaded languages is limited only by memory, with the caveat that loading additional languages will impact both speed and accuracy, as there is more work to do to decide on the applicable language, and there is more chance of hallucinating incorrect words.
This can be used to specify a white list for OCR. e.g. specify "1234567890" to recognize digits only. Note that the white list currently seems to only work with OcrEngineMode.OEM_TESSERACT_ONLY

member.name: M:Emgu.CV.OCR.Tesseract.Init(System.String,System.String,Emgu.CV.OCR.OcrEngineMode)
member.summary: Initialize the OCR engine using the specific dataPath and language name.
member.param: The datapath must be the name of the parent directory of tessdata and must end in / . Any name after the last / will be stripped.

The language is (usually) an ISO 639-3 string or NULL will default to eng. It is entirely safe (and eventually will be efficient too) to call Init multiple times on the same instance to change language, or just to reset the classifier. The language may be a string of the form [~]%lt;lang>[+[~]<lang>]* indicating that multiple languages are to be loaded. Eg hin+eng will load Hindi and English. Languages may specify internally that they want to be loaded with one or more other languages, so the ~ sign is available to override that. Eg if hin were set to load eng by default, then hin+~eng would force loading only hin. The number of loaded languages is limited only by memory, with the caveat that loading additional languages will impact both speed and accuracy, as there is more work to do to decide on the applicable language, and there is more chance of hallucinating incorrect words.

member.summary: The text

member.summary: The cost. The lower it is, the more confident is the result

member.summary: The region where the character is detected.

member.name: T:Emgu.CV.OCR.OcrEngineMode
member.summary: When Tesseract/Cube is initialized we can choose to instantiate/load/run only the Tesseract part, only the Cube part or both along with the combiner. The preference of which engine to use is stored in tessedit_ocr_engine_mode.

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.OcrEngineMode.TesseractOnly
member.summary: Run Tesseract only - fastest

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.OcrEngineMode.CubeOnly
member.summary: Run Cube only - better accuracy, but slower

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.OcrEngineMode.TesseractCubeCombined
member.summary: Run both and combine results - best accuracy

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.OcrEngineMode.Default
member.summary: Specify this mode to indicate that any of the above modes should be automatically inferred from the variables in the language-specific config, or if not specified in any of the above should be set to the default OEM_TESSERACT_ONLY.

member.name: T:Emgu.CV.OCR.PageSegMode
member.summary: Tesseract page segmentation mode

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.PageSegMode.OsdOnly
member.summary: PageOrientation and script detection only.

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.PageSegMode.AutoOsd
member.summary: Automatic page segmentation with orientation and script detection. (OSD)

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.PageSegMode.AutoOnly
member.summary: Automatic page segmentation, but no OSD, or OCR.

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.PageSegMode.Auto
member.summary: Fully automatic page segmentation, but no OSD.

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.PageSegMode.SingleColumn
member.summary: Assume a single column of text of variable sizes.

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.PageSegMode.SingleBlockVertText
member.summary: Assume a single uniform block of vertically aligned text.

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.PageSegMode.SingleBlock
member.summary: Assume a single uniform block of text. (Default.)

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.PageSegMode.SingleLine
member.summary: Treat the image as a single text line.

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.PageSegMode.SingleWord
member.summary: Treat the image as a single word.

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.PageSegMode.CircleWord
member.summary: Treat the image as a single word in a circle.

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.PageSegMode.SingleChar
member.summary: Treat the image as a single character.

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.PageSegMode.SparseText
member.summary: Find as much text as possible in no particular order.

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.PageSegMode.SparseTextOsd
member.summary: Sparse text with orientation and script det.

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.PageSegMode.RawLine
member.summary: Treat the image as a single text line, bypassing hacks that are Tesseract-specific.

member.name: F:Emgu.CV.OCR.PageSegMode.Count
member.summary: Number of enum entries.
